author: Matthew

review: I get green screen issue every 5 mins. Turn the TV off and on helps for 5 mins.How can I fix this?FIX FOUND:This happens to Panasonic Plasma TVs. Turn off Pixel Orbiter under Anti Image Retention Setting.This will fix it immediately. Everything works fine.Leaving it at 1 star until Amazon fixes this bug.Thank you Danny C. for telling us the fix.REVISED REVIEW TO 5 STARS. - 02.15.2015

review: Got my Firestick on Friday. On Sunday it goes back in the box and there it will probably remain until recycled.Terrible interface, hard to set up , remote works poorly (dup characters), and the app on a tablet is an aggravation.Whoever thought of using a QWERTY keyboard layout with the remote was not thinking.About ever fifth entry you had to go to back space to remove an extra character.Then if you were not VERY careful you lost it all trying to get to the password entry space.The tablet app was erratic. Selecting something was a hit or miss proposition. Not ready for prime time. or maybe just "not ready".

review: We love the fire stick. I would recommend it to anyone who has Amazon prime , my grandkids love that they can watch all of their shows on it now and I also love it because I can take it to a different room and watch tv . I will probably be getting another one in the future for my other room. This is definitely worth the money, so if your thinking about it buy it,we used to use the blue ray all the time to stream our shows, but I haven't used it since and I also don't have any interruption s with the fire stick. It's a great product.

review: Out of the box, installed, updated - every time it is used, it loses connection.I purchased it due to the great intro price, the fact I love Prime and the ability to watch Prime Videos without the PC/Laptop.However, I am unable to use it due to connection loss.Either that, or it states there is a slow internet connection.I have restarted the device, I have restarted the router (WRT54G2) despite successful connections with all over devices in my home, and have ensured the path is free and clear of anything (note: the router is less than 2 feet from the the TV), my download speeds are on par with my ISP and overall...well. I cannot use this stick.I have a feeling it will be finding it's way back to Amazon :(
